p.a: Event: Cancelled - JH Track & Field Invite

div.p: Congratulations to Mrs. Jane Carlson, who will be inducted into the Watchdog Hall of Fame Class of 2020—Fine Arts! Mrs. Carlson is a 1972 graduate of BHS. She has dedicated her life to teaching and directing productions and has been the heart and soul of the Beresford Area Arts. view image

Congratulations to Dr. Tom Van Lent, who will be inducted into the Watchdog Hall of Fame Class of 2020—Academics/Achievement! Dr. Van Lent is a 1976 graduate of BHS. He is currently the Vice-President of Science and Education at the Everglades Foundation in Florida. view image

Congratulations to Dr. Brenda Sternquist, who will be inducted into the Watchdog Hall of Fame Class of 2020--Academics/Achievement! Dr. Sternquist is a 1969 graduate of BHS. She has spent her entire career at Michigan State University and is currently a professor of marketing. view image

BHS Yearbook Help Needed! We are working to finish our yearbook from home. We need a few pictures from Watchdog Nation! Check out the attached image for details. All images should be sent to Stephanie.Voss@k12.sd.us view image

Please click on the link to view the 2020 SDHSAA Virtual Art Gallery for students in grades 7-12. BHS has 12 artists featured! Our Art Teacher is Mrs. Julie Saugstad. https://www.sdhsaa.com/Portals/0/Videos/VisualArts/2020VirtualGallery.mp4
